Team Class

class aiont.Team(data: Dict, *, scraper: aiont.Session)

Represents a Nitro Type Team.

id: int

The team’s ID.

tag: str

The team’s tag.

name: str

The team’s name.

open: bool

Whether the team allows new members.

created: int

The team’s creation time.

profile_views: int

The team’s amount of profile views.

member_count: int

The team’s amount of members.

min_level: int

The team’s minimum level required to join.

min_races: int

The team’s minimum amount of races required to join.

min_speed: int

The team’s minimum speed required to join.

description: str

The team’s description.

daily_races: int

The team’s daily races.

daily_speed: int

The team’s daily speed.

daily_accuracy: float

The team’s daily accuracy.

daily_points: float

The team’s daily points.

season_races: int

The team’s season races.

season_speed: int

The team’s season speed.

season_accuracy: float

The team’s season accuracy.

season_points: float

The team’s season points.

all_time_races: int

The team’s all time races.

all_time_speed: int

The team’s all time speed.

all_time_accuracy: float

The team’s all time accuracy.

all_time_points: float

The team’s all time points.

async get_captain(self) → aiont.Racer

Return the captain of the team.

Raises

aiont.HTTPException – Getting the captain failed.

Returns

The team’s captain.

Return type

aiont.Racer

async get_leaders(self, *, include_captain: bool = False) → List[Optional[aiont.Racer]]

Get the leaders of the team.

Parameters

include_captain (bool) – If the captain should be included. Defaults to False.

Raises

aiont.HTTPException – Getting the leaders failed.

Returns

The team’s leaders.

Return type

List[Optional[aiont.Racer]]

async get_members(self, *, include_leaders: bool = False) → List[Optional[aiont.Racer]]

Get the members of the team.

Parameters

include_leaders (bool) – If the captain should be included. Defaults to False.

Raises

aiont.HTTPException – Getting the members failed.

Returns

The team’s members.

Return type

List[Optional[aiont.Racer]]
